name: Condominios
body:
## Simple Scalability.
The Condo rails plugin was designed to simplify the process of uploading files to cloud storage providers in a scalable manner. It avoids the pitfalls of large file uploads that would otherwise pass-through an application instance or the need for a third party service.

```
$ gem install condo
```

## Requirements


### Ruby

Condo utilises the features of Ruby 1.9.x (compatible Rubies) and Rails 3.x


### Browser

Condo only works with browsers that support [XMLHttpRequest Level 2](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/XMLHttpRequest)

We like it this way.


### Cloud Storage

We are building drivers for providers that

1. Have a [RESTful API](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representational_state_transfer) 
2. Support [CORS](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-origin_resource_sharing)

Not all storage providers have support for direct resumable uploads however we are implementing this feature where possible.

Full resumable support is planned for:
* [RackSpace Cloud Files](http://www.rackspace.com/cloud/public/files/)
* [Amazon S3](http://aws.amazon.com/s3/)

Without resumable support:
* [Google Cloud Storage](http://cloud.google.com/products/cloud-storage.html) - Lacks CORS on chunked uploads

No support:
* [Azure Blob Storage](http://www.windowsazure.com/en-us/home/features/data-management/) - Lacks CORS altogether
